ygData.subject: SurtPrefixedDecideRule confusion

I'm trying to use SurtPrefixedDecideRule to run a relatively simple
crawl. =
 Here's the XML from my order file:

<newObject
class=3D"org.archive.crawle=
r.deciderules.SurtPrefixedDecideRule"
name=3D"acceptIfSurtPrefixed">
  <str=
ing name=3D"decision">ACCEPT</string>
  <string name=3D"surts-source-file"/=
>
  <boolean name=3D"seeds-as-surt-prefixes">true</boolean>
  <string name=
=3D"surts-dump-file"/>
</newObject>

In my understanding, I can then just u=
se SURT prefixes in my seeds
file.  My seeds file contains the following:

=
+http://(org,example,

When I run this, though, I get the log warning below=
 when it's
processng the seeds file, apparently indicating it's not expecti=
ng a
SURT here.  Should I just specify http://example.org in the seeds,
all=
owing it to derive the SURT above?  Or maybe I should use an
external SURT =
file?   

Thanks very much.

-Adam
